title: Doubt regarding seat selection /counselling
content: Hi guys.I have gotten a seat in PES through PESSAT first round counseling (AIML). This issue is, with my KCET rank (2.5k), I won't be gettingÂ  seat in AIML in the first round KCET counseling itself, but there is a high chance in second round. The doubt is, do I have to give up my PESSAT seat in order to attend 2nd round KCET counseling/ is it not possible for me to attend 2nd round KCET counseling once I submit all original documents by June 30th? Can a senior or anybody please guide me through this?

comments.body: I had the same exact question, I went to the college and I enquired about it. As long as ure joining PES in the 2nd extended round, they will refund the entire amount withholding 10k. But if u join any other college, then the fee would be deducted
so we can attend cet counseling without giving up the pessat seat?
but the second round cet counselling results would be declared around September and classes would have already started wouldnt it?
Yes. KCET students will join late and have a separate section/batch for the first semester. From the 2nd sem, its the same for all students regardless of how you were admitted.
so can I still go for kcet counselling when the college has already started for pessat students? thanks in advance

Yes u can, as long as ure continuing in PES, they don't mind, whenever u get a seat through kcet, ur fee structure would be changed. I confirmed this by going to the campus and talking to them about a week ago
